course_title: Fresh Sem: Math: Sports, Games & Gambling
class_notes:
Learning, playing and analyzing the following games (plus possibly some others): hearts, backgammon and blackjack
Using combinatorial counting techniques to verify that the historical hierarchy of poker hands is correct
Using basic probability techniques to compare various betting strategies in the casino games roulette and craps
Having class competitions in various types of football pools: against spreads, money lines, survivor, confidence
Having class competitions in picking games in the MLB postseason
course_description: Topics will be announced each semester when class is scheduled.
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - N301
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3020, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: R. Roth Jr., Status: Closed
